name: Scotch Thermal Laminating Pouches, 5 Mil Thick for Extra Protection, 4.3 Inches x 6.3 Inches, 100 Pouches (TP5900-100)
short_description: RECYCLE-READY PACKAGE PROTECTION: 8 rolls of Scotch Box Lock Paper Packing Tape that are recycle-ready and have the power of extreme grip to ensure boxes stay securely sealed
BIO-BASED MATERIAL: Mailing tape made with 45% bio-based material is curbside recyclable when left on the box, making recycling a breeze
EXTREME GRIP: Carton sealing tape features durable, solvent-free adhesive to create a strong seal that secures up to 80 pounds of weight per box
HOW TO USE: Laminate signs, flyers, schedules, certificates, to-do lists, children’s artwork and other frequently used documents
CLEAN POUCHES: Most household cleaners are safe to use on these laminator pouches, so you can easily disinfect them
FITS PHOTO-SIZE POUCHES: One package contains photo-size pouches that fit items up to 4.3 in. x 6.3 in.
USE WITH: It is recommended to use these self-laminating pouches with Scotch Thermal Laminators
LAMINATE WITH CONFIDENCE: When you want to laminate with confidence, choose Scotch Brand
Do not sanitize pouches before the lamination. Test a small amount in a corner before use, especially on important documents. Do not use acetone
product_description: Scotch Thermal Laminating Pouches are ultra-clear pouches that protect and add professionalism to documents you use frequently. These laminating pouches allow important information to show through with a clear, photo-safe finish. Lamination pouches are ideal for creating marker-proof, tear-proof and spill-proof paper items that you want to last in the home, office or classroom. These self laminating pouches are great school supplies and office supplies. Use laminate pouches for laminating signs, flyers, schedules, certificates, to-do lists, children’s artwork and other frequently used documents. Most household cleaners are safe to use on these laminator pouches, so you can disinfect them and know your important documents are germ-free (1). One package contains photo-size pouches that fit items up to 4.3 in. x 6.3 in. Each pack contains 100 pouches. For the best results, use these laminating pouches with Scotch Thermal Laminators. (1) Do not sanitize pouches before the lamination. Test a small amount in a corner before use, especially on important documents. Do not use acetone.

name: 33 PCS Laminating Sheets 9”x11.5”, Thermal Laminating Pouches, 3mil Plastic Paper Laminate Sheets, Laminator Sheets Plasticized Craft Office and School Supplies, Lamination Sheets for 8.5”x11” Paper
short_description: SUITABLE FOR LETTER SIZE SHEETS: Our laminating sheets are 9 "x11.5" in size and 3 mils thick, you will get 33 sheets of thermal laminating pouches in common life sizes up to 8.5 You will get 33 sheets of thermal laminating pouches in common life-size, which can seal up to 8.5 "x11" paper, plasticize items are 3 to 5 mils thick. Let's plastic the photos to keep them fresh for our youth.

HIGH-QUALITY SELECTION: We offer high-quality thermal laminating pouches, which are compatible with most laminating machine brands. Three-layer film structure: green material PET as the substrate, plasticized to improve the transparency; environmentally friendly EVA adhesive uniformly distributed on the inner side of the film, rapid penetration and adhesion when heated.

EASY TO USE: First, turn on the laminator and select the appropriate thickness gear for the laminating sheets. Secondly, open the lamination sheets, place the item into the laminate sheets, and reserve a certain edge sealing bit. Finally, the sealing side of the first into the laminating machine inlet waits for it to come out completely from the other end of the machine. Warm reminder: Please do not pull with your hands during the process of machine sealing.

GOOD PROTECTIVE COVER: Our laminating sheets have high transparency, giving documents, photos, certificates, etc. a smooth and flattering surface after gluing, no impurities and bubbles, and realistically restoring the items. Laminator sheets are one-sided headers, with a strong closure, so that the two films do not easily fall off and separate. The rounded corners design is beautiful and does not hurt hands, but also conducive to the laminator over-molding.

WIDE APPLICATIONS: Can be washed, friction-resistant, transparent laminator sheets can be used in offices, homes, schools, restaurants, etc. You can use it to plasticize children's artwork, timetables, office documents, recipes menus, business cards, photographs, lists of affairs, promotional leaflets, collectibles, and more.
